name: Run PowerShell Script from ADS
description: Detects PowerShell script execution from Alternate Data Stream (ADS)
pattern:
title: Run PowerShell Script from ADS
id: 45a594aa-1fbd-4972-a809-ff5a99dd81b8
status: experimental
description: Detects PowerShell script execution from Alternate Data Stream (ADS)
references:
    - https://github.com/p0shkatz/Get-ADS/blob/master/Get-ADS.ps1
author: Sergey Soldatov, Kaspersky Lab, oscd.community
date: 2019/10/30
tags:
    - attack.defense_evasion
    - attack.t1096
logsource:
    category: process_creation
    product: windows
detection:
    selection:
        ParentImage|endswith: '\powershell.exe'
        Image|endswith: '\powershell.exe'
        CommandLine|contains|all: 
          - 'Get-Content'
          - '-Stream'
    condition: selection
falsepositives:
    - Unknown
level: high
